ygData.subject: Re: Diamond Dust
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Damn I hate it when my formatting gets messed up like this, anyone know a cure? Anyway as was mentioned above the Ogres are quest ogres and are indifferent
ygData.messageBody:
>
> Message: 7 Date: Thu, 2 Dec 1999 11:14:29 -0700 From: "Kimes, Dean W."
> Subject: RE: Diamond Dust The ogres are in the large green area off lake
> rathe to the left of the zone in from S karana. They are indifferent to
> everyone. I pray to Ro for you. Leagnomo -----Original Message----- From:
> Brad Balatgek [mailto:gazamel@...] Sent: Thursday, December 02, 1999
> 9:25 AM To: EQ_Tinkering@onelist.com Subject: Re: [EQ_Tinkering] Diamond Dust
> From: Brad Balatgek Well, I have 5 diamonds on me...I guess that I can break
> down and get one crushed... Where exactly are these ogres? And what kind of
> faction do I need to talk to them? Gazamel Prime Master Tinker Solusek Ro


Damn I hate it when my formatting gets messed up like this, anyone know a cure?

Anyway as was mentioned above the Ogres are quest ogres and are indifferent to
everyone. They are in Lake of Rathe, but they are near the Rathe Mts zone
entrance. Left hand side when comming out of the water. Ive killed lots of
Ogres in my day and these guys are still indifferent to me, so there should be
no problem there.

I have talked to a GM that gave me a very cryptic response when I asked about
Diamond Dust. But everything I can tell leads me to believe that these Ogres
are the ones that can make Diamonds into Diamond Dust. If I had one Diamond I
would try it. Unfortunately Diamonds just don't drop that often. :(

Lomack, Knight Defender of the BCK
Master of Recruiting
www.bck.org
"The Crimson Knights"
Fennin Ro
